ing.item: Lemonade mix; small size, no sugar

directions.step:
Mix all ingredients together. Put into a food processor and blend well.
TO SERVE: Put 2 to 3 tsp. of mix into a cup. Pour boiling water over and stir.
NOTES: This recipe is great to give as gifts at Christmastime. Put into a small jelly jar. Take several colors of very thin ribbon and tie a bow around the jar lid or use pinking shears to cut a circle of decorative fabric to put over the top of the jar. Then tie with the ribbons or a gold cord. Recipe by Lynn Thomas.
